title: "Researchers predict the age of onset of polyglutamine diseases with machine learning"
excerpt: "Using machine learning, researchers at the Department of Neurology at Niigata University have developed a model to predict the asymptomatic probability at each age from the current age and number of CAG repeats in carriers of spinocerebellar degeneration."
